title: Bumped Off in the Belfry
description: It appeared Watch-seller Wesley had run out of time. Once the Detective found the body of the former murderer at the bottom of the church's bell tower, he realized that this could be no accident. The worst part? He might actually need the Oracle on this one.

personList.name: Priest Purple
personList.description: He's got the spirit. We're just not sure which one

personList.name: Organist Orange
personList.description: He will play for you the music of the night. Which tonight is probably a dirge.

personList.name: Choir-boy Cyan
personList.description: He's got a strong pair of lungs for someone so young.

weaponList.name: Gravity
weaponList.description: Sometimes all you need is a little push.

weaponList.name: A Very Loud Noise
weaponList.description: Oops. Didn't mean to make you jump.

weaponList.name: Guilt
weaponList.description: Nothing pulls you down quite like your own actions

locationList.name: Altar
locationList.description: A place to offer prayers. Or perhaps blood sacrifices

locationList.name: Belfry
locationList.description: There's a rope so you don't have to climb all the way up to the bell to ring it.

motiveList.name: To get some peace and quiet
To feel what it's like to kill

cluesList: Traces of ectoplasm were found in the Pews.
A weapon made of physics was found in the Belfry.
Choir-boy Cyan had no interest in keeping the place clean.
Blue eyes looked upon a Spooky Ghost
The tallest suspect was also the highest.
The pose of the corpse clearly indicated occult activities
